newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bhakti to up stakeholding in Ficorinvest.
newsitem.headline: Bhakti to up stakeholding in Ficorinvest.

text.p: Indonesia's privately-owned PT Bhakti Investama said on Monday it planned to increase its stakeholding in small-sized bank PT Bank Ficorinvest to 26.0 percent from 19.41 percent.

"The firm (Bhakti Investama) plans to own up to 26.0 percent stake in target firm (Bank Ficorinvest) so it needs (to buy) 10,544,000 shares, or a 6.59 percent stake," Bhakti Investama said in a statement.
Bhakti said it planned to buy the additional 6.59 percent stake from the public at 2,050 rupiah per share.
The statement did not give further details.
